guide.conclusion: Now you can easily make your iNecklace any color you want!
guide.introduction: This is a simple way to make the iNecklace light glow any color of the rainbow. In fact, it's so simple you can change it any time you want in a few minutes. No soldering required!
guide.introduction_rendered:
This is a simple way to make the iNecklace light glow any color of the rainbow. In fact, it's so simple you can change it any time you want in a few minutes. No soldering required!

Relevant parts
  • iNecklace
Tools
  • Scissors

lines.text: Start by taking the back off the iNecklace and removing its guts.
lines.text_raw: Start by taking the back off the iNecklace and removing its guts.

lines.text: Once it's apart, use a small object like a toothpick, or even a paperclip to push out the plastic cover from the aluminum housing. It's still in the iNecklace in the picture.
lines.text_raw: Once it's apart, use a small object like a toothpick, or even a paperclip to push out the plastic cover from the aluminum housing. It's still in the iNecklace in the picture.

lines.text: It will come out easily, but don't push too hard or it will scratch.
lines.text_raw: It will come out easily, but don't push too hard or it will scratch.

lines.text: Now you need to find some suitable plastic.
lines.text_raw: Now you need to find some suitable plastic.

lines.text: I found the packaging for my studio light bulbs to work perfectly. Anything packaged similarly will work.
lines.text_raw: I found the packaging for my studio light bulbs to work perfectly. Anything packaged similarly will work.

lines.text: Cut off a small piece that is flat. It only needs to be approximately 3/4" x 3/4".
lines.text_raw: Cut off a small piece that is flat. It only needs to be approximately 3/4" x 3/4".

lines.text: Next, trace around the white piece of plastic that you removed in step one onto the new piece of clear plastic.
lines.text_raw: Next, trace around the white piece of plastic that you removed in step one onto the new piece of clear plastic.

lines.text: Now you can use any permanent marker to customize the iNecklace. I chose purple since it's my wife's favorite color.
lines.text_raw: Now you can use any permanent marker to customize the iNecklace. I chose purple since it's my wife's favorite color.

lines.text: Color in the circle, and a little outside the edges. Yes, despite what you have been told all your life, you can color outside the lines! It's OK, I promise.
lines.text_raw: Color in the circle, and a little outside the edges. Yes, despite what you have been told all your life, you can color outside the lines! It's OK, I promise.

lines.text: It works best if you color on the opposite side from the black outline. That way the outline won't smudge.
lines.text_raw: It works best if you color on the opposite side from the black outline. That way the outline won't smudge.

lines.text: Next, cut the plastic circle out.
lines.text_raw: Next, cut the plastic circle out.

lines.text: Be sure to cut a little on the inside of the traced outline. A slightly smaller plastic circle is better. It makes reassembly easier.
lines.text_raw: Be sure to cut a little on the inside of the traced outline. A slightly smaller plastic circle is better. It makes reassembly easier.

lines.text: Last step is to assemble the modified iNecklace.
lines.text_raw: Last step is to assemble the modified iNecklace.

lines.text: First, insert the colored piece of plastic with the newly colored side facing inwards.
lines.text_raw: First, insert the colored piece of plastic with the newly colored side facing inwards.

lines.text: Next, add the original white plastic diffuser.
lines.text_raw: Next, add the original white plastic diffuser.

lines.text: Followed by the battery and back cover.
lines.text_raw: Followed by the battery and back cover.

guide.summary: The iNecklace from the Maker Shed makes a great gift. It's a sophisticated and elegant piece of jewelry with a beautiful pulsating white glow. As beautiful as that white glow is, it's also exactly what I wanted to modify.
guide.title: iHacked the iNecklace
